sentences.english: If you’ve got strep throat, stay home.
sentences.chinese: 如果你患上了咽喉炎，那就呆在家吧。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of glucocorticoids in the treatment of acute laryngitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析糖皮质激素在小儿急性喉炎中的治疗价值。

sentences.english: With acute laryngitis easily cause difficulty in breathing, special attention should be paid.
sentences.chinese: 伴急性喉炎易引起呼吸困难，要特别注意。

sentences.english: Conclusion In the treatment of acute pharyngolaryngitis, Sinupret is effective and safety.
sentences.chinese: 结论仙璐贝滴剂治疗急性咽喉炎安全有效。

sentences.english: For many years Harold was afflicted with edematous laryngitis .
sentences.chinese: 哈德罗患水肿性喉炎多年了。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze clinical effect of glucocorticoid in treatment of childrenwithacutelaryngitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析糖皮质激素在小儿急性喉炎中的临床应用。

sentences.english: To the cold, whooping cough, laryngitis , chronic bronchitic effective.
sentences.chinese: 对感冒，百日咳，喉炎，慢性支气管炎有效。

sentences.english: The most common adverse events were headache, upper respiratory tract infection, and inflammation of the nose and throat.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的副反应是头痛，上呼吸道感染和鼻咽喉炎。

sentences.english: Jake called his doctor to tell him that his wife had laryngitis.
sentences.chinese: 杰克打电话给他的医生，说他的妻子有喉炎。

sentences.english: Conclusion This therapy with ESED is effective on chronic hypertrophic laryngitis.
sentences.chinese: 结论会厌逐瘀汤加味治疗慢性肥厚性喉炎有确切疗效。

sentences.english: Vitamin C is believed to help fight sore throats and colds.
sentences.chinese: 一般认为维生素C对咽喉炎和感冒有疗效。

sentences.english: Bee Mucus can be used to cure various inflammations, bronchus asthma, pharyngitis and cold.
sentences.chinese: 治疗炎症，支气管哮喘，咽喉炎，感冒。

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3
